name: Show progress bar
descr: Set to true if you want the respondent to see a progress bar

name: Progress Bar Text
descr: Display text within the progress bar to encourage users to explore further details

name: Hide next button
descr: Hide the next button if minimum not reached.

name: Minimum Ideal Length
descr: The minimum amount of characters to fill hte progress bar (default is 200).

name: Progress bar text
descr: The text which appears inside the progress bar. If multiple texts are needed, separate them by '|' (Progress Bar Text needs to be set to true).
value: Please write down as much as you'd like!|Thank you!
